scripts.build: bun build --compile --minify ./src/server.ts --outfile server && bun build --compile --minify ./src/client.ts --outfile client
scripts.delete-image-and-up-docker: docker stop $(docker ps -q) && docker rm $(docker ps -aq) && sudo docker build -t api-money-manager.alexgalhardo.com . && docker run -d -p 3000:3000 api-money-manager.alexgalhardo.com
scripts.build-and-up-docker: sudo docker build -t api-money-manager.alexgalhardo.com . && docker run -d -p 3000:3000 api-money-manager.alexgalhardo.com
